card.name: Elvish Warmaster
card.text: Whenever one or more other Elves enter the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn. {5}{G}{G}: Elves you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Imperious Perfect
card.text: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Realmwalker
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) As Realmwalker enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast creature spells of the chosen type from the top of your library.

card.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
card.text: Haste When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Marwyn, the Nurturer
card.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer. {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.

card.name: Allosaurus Shepherd
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Green spells you control can't be countered. {4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, each Elf creature you control has base power and toughness 5/5 and becomes a Dinosaur in addition to its other creature types.

card.name: Jaspera Sentinel
card.text: Reach {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.text: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

card.name: Elvish Clancaller
card.text: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {4}{G}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Elvish Clancaller, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Dwynen's Elite
card.text: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Collected Company
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Khalni Garden
card.text: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Lair of the Hydra
card.text: If you control two or more other lands, Lair of the Hydra enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {X}{G}: Until end of turn, Lair of the Hydra becomes an X/X green Hydra creature. It's still a land. X can't be 0.

card.name: Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
card.text: First strike, menace Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token. Ragavan enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Reckless Ringleader
card.text: Haste When Reckless Ringleader enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains haste.

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.

card.name: Ramunap Ruins
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}. {2}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Ramunap Ruins deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Fanatical Firebrand
card.text: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Monastery Swiftspear
card.text: Haste\nProwess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Goblin Chainwhirler
card.text: First strike When Goblin Chainwhirler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.

card.name: Bonecrusher Giant // Stomp
card.text: undefined

card.name: Embercleave
card.text: Flash This spell costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature you control. When Embercleave enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike and trample. Equip {3}

card.name: Robber of the Rich
card.text: Reach, haste Whenever Robber of the Rich attacks, if defending player has more cards in hand than you, exile the top card of their library. During any turn you attacked with a Rogue, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

card.name: Torbran, Thane of Red Fell
card.text: If a red source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead.

card.name: Anax, Hardened in the Forge
card.text: Anax's power is equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.) Whenever Anax or another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 red Satyr creature token with "This creature can't block." If the creature had power 4 or greater, create two of those tokens instead.

card.name: Den of the Bugbear
card.text: If you control two or more other lands, Den of the Bugbear enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {3}{R}: Until end of turn, Den of the Bugbear becomes a 3/2 red Goblin creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking." It's still a land.

card.name: Castle Embereth
card.text: Castle Embereth enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain. {T}: Add {R}. {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
